messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Bone Zone 13".

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Since security is having a nap, I'm gonna dab on all the haters myself.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Bone Zone 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be a Vendomat.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hop was the traitor all along kill him on sight
